Text: Demonoid4Ever - I just wanted to tell you how much I and my friends appreciate your football uploads. You upload the best games in the best quality and it really means a lot to us. Keep doing what you're doing and supplying great matches for us to watch. Thanks!
@NotAFraud Thanks for your kind words. I'm glad you and your friends are enjoying my uploads. I try to share with the TPB community quality stuff I download elsewhere. Have a nice weekend!
